title: Home Assistant Integration Manifest
description: Manifest of integration for Home Assistant smart home system

domain.description: The unique domain name of this integration. Cannot be changed

documentation.description: URL of the website containing documentation on how to use that integration

requirements.description: List of required Python libraries or modules for this integration

dependencies.description: List of the other Home Assistant integrations that need to Home Assistant to set up successfully prior to the integration being loaded

codeowners.description: List of GitHub usernames or team names of people that are responsible for this integration
